prompt: Create a futuristic loading page with a black background (0xFF000000). Center a circular progress indicator with a neon green color (0xFF00E676). Surround the indicator with a glowing effect using a BoxShadow. Above the indicator, display the text 'Initializing...' in a futuristic font style (use GoogleFonts' Orbitron if available, else default to bold) with a white color (0xFFFFFFFF) and 18px font size, positioned 20 pixels above. Use a Column widget within a Scaffold, ensuring vertical centering. Add a periodic scale animation to the indicator for a dynamic effect.
